body.name: Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 25Kpa Powerful Suction Stick Vacuum, 40Mins Runtime Detachable Battery, 3 Power Modes & LED Display, 6 in 1 Lightweight Vacuum for Hardwood Floor Carpet Pet Hair
features: 【Powerful 25Kpa Suction Power & Three Modes】The cordless vacuum cleaner generates high-speed airflow with an upgraded 250W powerful motor, which is very energy-saving and efficient, generates less heat and makes less noise. 3 gears' suction adjustment and provides up to 25Kpa suction in maximum mode. From deep cleaning carpet dust, cat litter, dog food crumbs, pet hair, and marble, tile, and hardwood floor.

【LED Display A Glance】 The vacuum cleaner cordless is equipped with an LED display at a glance, which helps you know the current performance of the vacuum cleaner at a glance. The LED control panel allows you to easily adjust the vacuum power, which is more convenient and worry-free than traditional button operation. The control panel displays battery level, suction performance, brush clogged alarm and suction clogged alarm.

【Efficient Filtration & Extra Filter】Stick vacuum cleaner with all-new cyclone technology and high-density meshing. Captures the smallest particles on flat surfaces, with up to 99.99% efficiency of fine particles as small as 0.1um. Comes with 2 HEPA washable filters to prolong the life of the vacuum cleaner, effectively prevent dust accumulation and deliver fresh air, making your home more environmentally friendly.

【Detachable Battery & Long-lasting Runtime】With a large-capacity detachable battery, the cordless vacuum cleaner can provide an outstanding cleaning performance for up to 40 minutes in standard suction mode, which is advantageous for cleaning larger areas or multiple rooms without the need for frequent recharging. Two charging mode, the charging cable is directly inserted into the cordless stick vacuum or the battery is charged separately.

【Lightweight & Flexible LED Brush Head】 This stick cordless vacuum cleaner with LED headlights to illuminate furniture in the dark corner, preventing you from missing any spots. With a flexible 180°swivel sideways and 90°up and down, it glides easily into tight spaces, such as under low furniture or around obstacles, removing dust, debris and hair with ease.

【6 in 1 Versatile Cleaning】This lightweight vacuum comes with a 2-in-1 brush, a sofa brush and an extendable metal tube that easily converts into a handheld vacuum cleaner to help you clean stairs, sofas, desks, cars and more. The extendable tube is perfect for cleaning high places like curtains and ceilings. The lightweight portable vacuum cleaner design make one-handed operation effortless.

【Gift-Worthy】 A portable cordless vacuum cleaner with these features can make an excellent gift, especially for individuals who have pets. Pet owners often deal with pet hair and other messes that can be challenging to clean thoroughly. A versatile and lightweight vacuum cleaner can be a valuable tool for pet owners, helping them maintain a clean and tidy living space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product, amazing price, fast shipping too
reviews.reviewText: It is flavorful and not sickeningly sweet. Just perfect consistency and texture. Can eat by itself or on a cracker or with tortilla.lightly toasted in toaster oven. Best price anywhere. I bought 4 sets. Each set set is a 4 pack.. Expiration almost three years. If you love Membrillo, you'll love this. It is made of quince.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fruit, another level item!!
reviews.reviewText: Size, texture, delicious and sweet but perfect balance!! The best ever!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum is perfect. It’s light weight, powerful easy to clean and price is great. Highly recommend this vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best sweeper out there!
reviews.reviewText: I love that it’s lightweight. It has three suction settings so it’s perfect on the low setting for rugs. I also use it on my wood floors and it’s amazing with picking up the dust on wood floors! I love this thing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: Get this vacuum, so far it’s been great & picks up perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have a border collie so pet hair is a constant issue. I love that I can just flip this on walk around the house and scoop up all the hair and dump it in the trash in less than 5 minutes. It's not incredibly powerful but it does exactly what it's advertised to do. This is an absolutely amazing little product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the price
reviews.reviewText: Arrived on time and couldn't wait to use it. I have a husky and there are hairs everywhere, this vacuum seems to be doing its job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more plugging and unplugging the vacuum.
reviews.reviewText: I was very surprised how powerful this cordless machine was. I had vacuumed a carpet then ran over it with the cordless and lo and behold there was still dirt in the carpet. Wonderful buy.
I love these! Too bad I can't get them in Canada!
